metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.code_html:
mounted(){
  if(this.$slots.topSlot){
    this.slotsText = "Content for the 'topSlot' slot is provided by the parent."
  }
  else {
    this.slotsText = "Content for the 'topSlot' slot is NOT provided by the parent."
  }
}

content.text: The $slots object represents the slots passed from the parent.
content.html: The $slots object represents the slots passed from the parent.

content.text: Slots passed from the parent can be seen by calling this.$slots , or by calling this.$slots.topSlot to see a specific slot named 'topSlot'.
content.html: Slots passed from the parent can be seen by calling this.$slots, or by calling this.$slots.topSlot to see a specific slot named 'topSlot'.

content.text: The $slots object can be used to check if slots are provided by the parent component, like in the example above, or to write render functions.
content.html: The $slots object can be used to check if slots are provided by the parent component, like in the example above, or to write render functions.
